Logic

Class Portals

  • java.lang.Object
    • Logic.Portals

  • public class Portals
extends java.lang.Object
    Two Portals appear and disappear in random intervalls on the Field. If a snakes head moves on a Portal it is teleported to the corresponding other portal. If the portals disappear while a snake is still teleporting, the part of the snake that has not moved through is cut off. Functions to use for other groups: - use the getPortal functions to get the Point of the portals - use the isActive() function to know whether the Portal is active!!! Important (portal1 and portal2 even when not active contain the last Position) - use the getTTL() function to know how long a portal is going to last
    Author:
    Chris Meier, Florian Riedl
